definition: to brand/to iron/to bake (in a pan)

sentences.english: Antistatic 24V soldering iron has good protection of PCB.
sentences.chinese: 低压24V烙铁为防静电设计，有效保护线路板。

sentences.english: Check to make sure all soldering irons are switched OFF.
sentences.chinese: 确保所有的电烙铁已切断电源。

sentences.english: At 500 degrees Celsius and the original iron did the first experiment of corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 在500摄氏度下和原装烙铁头做过氧化腐蚀实验。

sentences.english: Meilan electric iron production of bamboo flowers, so beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 用电烙铁生产的梅兰竹菊，美丽非凡。

sentences.english: When the solder flows, remove the iron and let the area cool.
sentences.chinese: 当锡焊料开始流动，移开电烙铁，使该位置降温冷却。

sentences.english: The litz that I have can be easily tinned by using a hot soldering iron and solder.
sentences.chinese: 用电烙铁和焊锡可以很容易的给李兹线上锡。

sentences.english: Vacuum gun and 24V soldering iron have good protection of PCB by antistatic design.
sentences.chinese: 吸锡枪及24V烙铁为防静电设计，有效保护线路板。

sentences.english: A soldering iron can melt metal and bind joints together.
sentences.chinese: 电烙铁可以融化金属和关节结合在一起。

sentences.english: Others would have red-hot irons and pincers applied to their flesh.
sentences.chinese: 其他一些人则遭到热得通红的烙铁和钳子烙烫皮肉。

sentences.english: Don't knock soldering iron to avoid damage.
sentences.chinese: 烙铁不可重摔或敲打，以避免损坏烙铁。

sentences.english: Don't knock soldering iron to avoid damage.
sentences.chinese: 烙铁不可重摔或敲打，以避免损坏烙铁。

sentences.english: Used safety and low voltage 24V heater.
sentences.chinese: 采用24V低压烙铁芯安全供电。

sentences.english: Soldering irons are an essential tool to melt materials together.
sentences.chinese: 烙铁是一个必不可少的工具材料一并融化。

sentences.english: Antistatic thermostat soldering iron used imported heater and tips for longer life.
sentences.chinese: 防静电恒温烙铁采用进口发热芯及烙铁咀，寿命更长。

sentences.english: Antistatic thermostat soldering iron used imported heater and tips for longer life.
sentences.chinese: 防静电恒温烙铁采用进口发热芯及烙铁咀，寿命更长。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses an electric iron which can continuously adjust the temperature.
sentences.chinese: 一种在使用中可连续进行温度调节的电烙铁。

definition: burning hot/fiery/to have one's hair permed with hot curling tongs
to set fire to/to burn down/burning hot/baked cake
to scorch/(of the sun) to beat down on
